column1: #Text=This editorial is pretty much similar to the Guardian's editorial this morning.
#Text=While some points made are valid concerns about Trump, both editorials glaringly neglect to mention Hillary Clinton's egregious faults.
#Text=The fact that the Democratic party sold out it's base support during the primaries - it's corruption exposed is probably reason enough that they lost.
#Text=Notwithstanding the fact that Clinton's stated platform of a no fly zone over Syria was going to lead to war with Russia had me breathing a sigh of relief this morning.
